amendment.description: Amendments en bloc consisting of amendments numbered 329, 330, and 331 printed in the Congressional Record.

action.text: Amendments en bloc (A129) offered by Ms. Kaptur.

Mr. Rogers (KY) raised a point of order against the Kaptur amendments (A129). Mr. Rogers (KY) stated that the provisions of the amendments violate the Budget Act. The Chair sustained the point of order.
